duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide service excellence and establish the organization as a leader in client experience.
Welcome and engage with clients, understanding the purpose of their visit and facilitating a seamless experience.
Swiftly manage customer issues and provide timely follow-through on customer requests.
Assist with returns, curbside pickup, buy online/pick up in store, and other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 1 year of experience in customer service or hospitality industries. Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays.
